question: All most all of Iron Ore Production of India (96%) is confined to which among the following five states of India?
option1: Orissa, Karnataka, Chhattisgarh, Goa and Jharkhand
option2: Orissa, Karnataka, Chhattisgarh, Andhra Pradesh and Tamil Nadu
option4: Orissa, Karnataka, Chhattisgarh, West Bengal and Uttar Pradesh
answer: Orissa, Karnataka, Chhattisgarh, Goa and Jharkhand
